node1.PC_Text: Would you get me some of the chocolate chip cookies from the table?
node1.NPC_Response: No problem! I was just going to get some myself.

node1.PC_Text: Could you make me a plate of cookies and milk?
node1.NPC_Response: Umm, OK. I can bring you some if they have milk.

node1.PC_Text: Could you watch my plate of cookies? I can see the HR guy eyeing them from here.
node1.NPC_Response: I really don’t think he wants your cookies.

A.PC_Text: Thanks! And can you bring me a napkin?
Great. I wouldn’t mind a slice of cake and some M&M's while you're at it.
Actually would you just bring me the whole tray so I can take them home with me?
A.NPC_Response: I think they are for everyone to share, Annie!

B.PC_Text: Thanks! And can you bring me a napkin?
Great. I wouldn’t mind a slice of cake and some M&M's while you're at it.
B.NPC_Response: Um, OK… I will do my best.

B.PC_Text: Why wouldn’t they have milk? What kind of lame party is this? Get me some ice too!
B.NPC_Response: You know, Annie, maybe you can just get it yourself.

C.PC_Text: Yea, maybe you're right. But could you hold them while I get a drink?
How would you know? Can you just watch these for me?
Come on- chocolate chip and oatmeal raisin? Of course he wants them! Can you protect these or not?
C.NPC_Response: No I don't think I can Annie! Just watch them yourself.

AA.PC_Text: What kind of word is napkin? Nap-kin? Nap plus kin? It makes no sense.
AA.NPC_Response: I don’t know, Annie. It's just a word.

AA.PC_Text: Actually, bring me each cookie on an individual napkin.
AA.NPC_Response: I'll do what I can, Annie.

AB.PC_Text: Only if you have a free hand. Thanks!
Why wouldn't you be able to?
AB.NPC_Response: I only have two hands, Annie!

AB.PC_Text: It's fine. Just make two trips if you can’t carry it all. I don’t mind waiting.
AB.NPC_Response: I'll let you get it yourself then.

AC.PC_Text: OK, I'll wait until the end of the party.
AC.NPC_Response: That's a bit better at least.

AC.PC_Text: No one else needs them here! I'm helping them lose weight.
You know I can’t buy my own cookies! My mom is a baker! It’s practically treason.
AC.NPC_Response: I don’t think it works that way.

BA.PC_Text: Thanks! I don’t want to lose my spot next to the cheese plate.
BA.NPC_Response: I really don't think you need to worry about that.

BA.PC_Text: Thank you!I I wouldn't have any if I were you though. You put on a few pounds recently!
BA.NPC_Response: How could you say that to me, Annie?

BB.PC_Text: Only if you have a free hand. Thanks!
Why wouldn't you be able to?
It's fine. Just make two trips if you can’t carry it all. I don’t mind waiting.
BB.NPC_Response: I'll let you get it yourself then.

BC.PC_Text: Oh, I'm sorry, Fran. I really appreciate it.
BC.NPC_Response: It's fine. I'll see if they have milk.

BC.PC_Text: I would but I really don't want to.
It's the least you can do since you still haven’t invited me to your new house!
BC.NPC_Response: Uh, I am still settling in…

CA.PC_Text: Make sure you hold onto it tight!
CA.NPC_Response: I really don’t think you need to worry.

CA.PC_Text: I counted the cookies by the way, so don’t get any ideas!

CB.PC_Text: Thanks! You know I love my cookies.
Do you think you can handle this?
I don’t want a repeat of high school when you said you would save my seat that time and forgot!
CB.NPC_Response: I don’t know what you are talking about.

CC.PC_Text: I'm sorry, Annie. I'm just really hungry.
Why do you think they call me the Cookie Monster? Me want cookies!
Make sure you don't steal any yourself! I am watching you!
CC.NPC_Response: Annie, there are plenty of cookies left! No one is going to take them.
